roleset.name: not do some action
roleset.note: REFRAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'refrain' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry refrain-69. (from refrain.01-v)

example.name: usual usage
example.text: The government also urged whites to refrain from panic over growing black protests, such as the massive anti-apartheid rally Sunday on the outskirts of Soweto.
example.arg: from panic over growing black protests, such as the massive anti-apartheid rally Sunday on the outskirts of Soweto

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: ``[Those who have no money and aren't buying]-1 think it's right *trace*-1 to refrain, but those with money who want to buy for themselves pay no attention,'' says an official of the Japan-U.S. Business Council.
